title.title: BALI RAFTING AND ATV RIDE TOUR
title.text: BALI RAFTING AND ATV RIDE TOUR
title.html: BALI RAFTING AND ATV RIDE TOUR

tagline.title: BALI RAFTING AND ATV RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBO ACTIVITIES BY OFFER YOU TO ENJOY WHITE WATER RAFTING ADVENTURE AT AYUNG RIVER AND THEN RIDING ATV BIKE
tagline.text: BALI RAFTING AND ATV RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBO ACTIVITIES BY OFFER YOU TO ENJOY WHITE WATER RAFTING ADVENTURE AT AYUNG RIVER AND THEN RIDING ATV BIKE
tagline.html: BALI RAFTING AND ATV RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBO ACTIVITIES BY OFFER YOU TO ENJOY WHITE WATER RAFTING ADVENTURE AT AYUNG RIVER AND THEN RIDING ATV BIKE

description.text: Bali Rafting and ATV Ride Tour is an Bali Double Activities Tour Packages we created by allowed you to enjoy two activities in one day, first we will try the White Water Rafting Adventure at Ayung River with rapids challenge class 2 and 3 and for sure this is safe for beginner which never try the rafting before and then continue the tour to enjoy explore Bali Islands by using ATV bike with professional ATV guide. First you will have safety briefing before start the rafting and then the guide will lead your adventure for maximum 2 hours in Ayung river, if you do the rafting fast or river flow is fast, duration around 1.5 hours, the rafting is sharing trip, is mean we will wait other guest for enough in one boat, for 1 boat is accomodated till 6 person + 1 Rafting Guide, but if your group is 6 person, we can accomodated in 1 boat, if less than 6 person but want to have private boat for rafting, please contact us for the additional cost for Private rafting boat, after finish the rafting you will enjoy the delicious lunch buffet with Indonesian food and then after finish the lunch you will escorted to the ATV provider where you will try to beat the beaten track for maximum drive is for 2 hours, if you drive fast will be around 1.5 hours, For the ATV is sharing trip, is mean we wait till enough bike for one journey and will assist by ATV Bike Guide and then after finish ATV Ride tour, we will bring you back to your hotel with full of amazing memory during this double activities of Bali Rafting and ATV Ride Tour packages. The Best Combo adventure we offer to you during your holiday, by doing this two adventure of Rafting and ATV Ride tour will make your day fantastic. The tour will assist by our professional Bali Tour Driver by perform excellent tour services with private car, clean, comfortable and good A/C condition.

The tour will assist by our professional Bali Tour Driver by perform excellent tour services with private car, clean, comfortable and good A/C condition.

Rafting and ATV Ride Tour Price and Inclusion

image.title: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour | Bali Rafting and ATV Ride Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour is one of white water rafting adventure tour packages we have to enjoy the great challenge of rapids adventure at Ayung River in northern of Ubud village. This river offer amazing experience for your journey to explore the river with amazing panorama view. This river is very suitable for beginner who never try the rafting before but want to try the challenge. During the rafting you will stop at the small waterfall at the river and allowed you to swim at the river. Is an rare experience you will have and the professional rafting guide will always give his maksimun services to make you more enjoyable. A very impressive experience in doing ayung rafting adventure which is very enchanting and stimulates your adrenaline when conquering the water currents in this ayung river, with natural experiences around the ayung river will make this Bali Rafting and ATV Ride Tour adventure very enjoyable.
description.html: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour is one of white water rafting adventure tour packages we have to enjoy the great challenge of rapids adventure at Ayung River in northern of Ubud village. image.title: Bali ATV Ride Tour | Bali Rafting and ATV Ride Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali ATV Ride Tour Packages is a Journey to explore the hidden beauty of Bali Islands by riding ATV Bike and assist by professional Bali ATV Ride tour. The journey will explore the beauty of the rice field and see the amazing view of the rice, you can stop here for take picture as much as you want and then continue to passed the local village and see the social activities life at the village. Is great experience by explore Bali islands in the way you never try before. Try the beat the beatean track we offer during this trip and this is not a speeding tour, it just only sightseeing tour by riding an ATV bike. A very different experience where you will conquer the tracks on this ATV Ride track for a duration of maximum is 2 hours with each track having a different level of difficulty that will make your adrenaline rush, a very enjoyable Bali Rafting and ATV Ride Tour experience and will definitely make your adventurous soul satisfied

price.title: Bali Rafting and ATV Ride Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Rafting and ATV Ride Tour Price :

  • 1 person : IDR 1,250,000 (solo traveler)
  • 2 person : IDR 900,000/person
  • 3 person : IDR 850,000/person
  • 4 person : IDR 800,000/person
  • 5 person or More : IDR 775,000/person

Remarks :

  • Get Special price group booking

Bali Rafting and ATV Ride Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Good A/C condition
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • Rafting Adventure at Ayung River
  • ATV Ride Adventure (single bike or tandem bike)
  • Professional Ayung Rafting and ATV Ride Guide
  • Lunch Buffet Indonesian Food
  • Mineral Water
  • Insurance Coverage

Activity Note :

  • The rafting is sharing boat, is mean 1 boat accomodate till 6 person, we will wait till enough person for do rafting
  • If you 6 person, can accomodated your group in 1 boat, if less than 6 person but want private boat, will have additional cost, please contact us for the additional cost private boat rafting
  • Duration of the rafting is maximum is 2 hours rafting, but defend, if you do activity fast, will be around 1.5 hours
  • The ATV is sharing trip, is mean we wait till enough ATV bike for one journey and assist by ATV Guide
  • Duration for ATV is maximum duration is 2 hours drive, if you drive fast, it will be around 1.5 hours

Area Covered for Pick Up :

Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

Terms Payment

  • Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

Note :

  • The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The car is Private Car, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion in the car
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
